articles.title: Why Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Are Soaring Tuesday
articles.summary: Gaxos.AI shares are skyrocketing Tuesday morning. The company announced the launch of its new artificial intelligence platform, Art-Gen.AI.
articles.translated_title: Why Gaxos.AI (GXAI) Shares Are Soaring Tuesday
articles.translated_summary: Gaxos.AI shares are skyrocketing Tuesday morning. The company announced the launch of its new artificial intelligence platform, Art-Gen.AI.

articles.title: How AI is changing the work of teachers in the classroom
articles.summary: Some educators have been teaching themselves how to use artificial intelligence. In a recent survey, teachers said it saved them time, but some people argue AI discourages students from critical thinking.
articles.translated_title: How AI is changing the work of teachers in the classroom
articles.translated_summary: Some educators have been teaching themselves how to use artificial intelligence. In a recent survey, teachers said it saved them time, but some people argue AI discourages students from critical thinking.

articles.title: China’s DeepSeek releases V3.1, boosting AI model’s capabilities
articles.summary: The speed and popularity of DeepSeek’s models have challenged US incumbents such as OpenAI, and demonstrated how Chinese companies can make strides in artificial intelligence for seemingly a fraction of the cost.
articles.translated_title: China’s DeepSeek releases V3.1, boosting AI model’s capabilities
articles.translated_summary: The speed and popularity of DeepSeek’s models have challenged US incumbents such as OpenAI, and demonstrated how Chinese companies can make strides in artificial intelligence for seemingly a fraction of the cost.

articles.title: How Metro Detroit school is approaching use of AI in the classroom
articles.summary: As we increasingly ponder how to use artificial intelligence in our jobs and everyday lives, schools are also trying to figure out how to safely use it and teach it.
articles.translated_title: How Metro Detroit school is approaching use of AI in the classroom
articles.translated_summary: As we increasingly ponder how to use artificial intelligence in our jobs and everyday lives, schools are also trying to figure out how to safely use it and teach it.

articles.title: China’s DeepSeek Releases V3.1, Boosting AI Model’s Capabilities
articles.summary: DeepSeek announced what appeared to be an update to its older V3 artificial intelligence model on Tuesday, declaring an enhanced version ready for testing.
articles.translated_title: China’s DeepSeek Releases V3.1, Boosting AI Model’s Capabilities
articles.translated_summary: DeepSeek announced what appeared to be an update to its older V3 artificial intelligence model on Tuesday, declaring an enhanced version ready for testing.

articles.title: Starting Off the School Year: How to Use AI to Manage Your Time as a Student
articles.summary: Speaking with real students about common time management pitfalls, I came up with this list of artificial intelligence tools that can help you find your balance.
articles.translated_title: Starting Off the School Year: How to Use AI to Manage Your Time as a Student

articles.title: Wall Street isn’t worried about an AI bubble. Sam Altman is.
articles.summary: Wall Street analysts are confident the artificial intelligence boom still has room to run. Even if Sam Altman isn't.
articles.translated_title: Wall Street isn’t worried about an AI bubble. Sam Altman is.
articles.translated_summary: Wall Street analysts are confident the artificial intelligence boom still has room to run. Even if Sam Altman isn't.

articles.title: Databricks valued at over $100 billion in latest fundraising amid AI rush
articles.summary: Databricks said on Tuesday it was raising new funds that would value the data analytics firm at more than $100 billion, less than a year after its previous round, as investor appetite for artificial intelligence companies remains strong.
articles.translated_title: Databricks valued at over $100 billion in latest fundraising amid AI rush
articles.translated_summary: Databricks said on Tuesday it was raising new funds that would value the data analytics firm at more than $100 billion, less than a year after its previous round, as investor appetite for artificial intelligence companies remains strong.

articles.title: Databricks eyes over $100 billion valuation as investors back AI growth plans
articles.summary: Analytics firm Databricks said on Tuesday its valuation was set to jump 61% to more than $100 billion in a funding round less than a year after its last, underscoring strong investor demand for artificial intelligence startups.
articles.translated_title: Databricks eyes over $100 billion valuation as investors back AI growth plans
articles.translated_summary: Analytics firm Databricks said on Tuesday its valuation was set to jump 61% to more than $100 billion in a funding round less than a year after its last, underscoring strong investor demand for artificial intelligence startups.

articles.title: Americans fear AI permanently displacing workers, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
articles.summary: Americans are deeply concerned over the prospect that advances in artificial intelligence could put swaths of the country out of work permanently, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.
articles.translated_title: Americans fear AI permanently displacing workers, Reuters/Ipsos poll finds
articles.translated_summary: Americans are deeply concerned over the prospect that advances in artificial intelligence could put swaths of the country out of work permanently, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.
